briefTitle: Can 3D Ultrasound Be Used Reproducibly by Radiation Therapists in Partial Breast Image-Guided Radiation Therapy
officialTitle: Can 3D Ultrasound Be Used Reproducibly by Radiation Therapists in Partial Breast Image-Guided Radiation Therapy?
conditions: Radiation Therapy for Primary Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Will the Clarity of breast IGRT product have the potential to improve localization through its ability to compare 3DUS at the time of planning to 3DUS at the time of treatment.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Subjects will be 27 consenting women undergoing CT simulation for adjuvant breast radiotherapy at VIC ≤16 weeks after BCS.
* Women must have primary tumors \<3cm, pathologically N0 disease, and negative surgical margins.
* Seroma clarity score \<2

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients will be excluded if they have had mastectomy or receive adjuvant chemotherapy that results in the CT simulation session occurring \>16 weeks after the BCS date.
